title: Rain
marks: Signature, Title, Date, and Label LRC, Printed signature: [ 千鶴子 ] {Chizuko}; LRC, in
description: area of teal and dark blue labyrinthine designs at UL with teal lines overlapping narrow purple rectangles at LQ; yellow, teal, and green thin rectangles extend from ULQ to LRQ; four thick black vertical lines and one thick blue vertical line crisscross across center; at RQ series of purple lines with overlapping lighter purple blocky designs
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
